name: Animecrazy Cleaner Layout
description: Removes ads regions, polls and other useless features, leaving only the 'core' elements.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("animecrazy.net") {
	.Footer,
	.Header,
	.adbox,
	.adboxl,
	.adside,
	.SC > H1,
	.SC > br,
	.animeCompleted,
	.latestAnimeReleases > H3,
	.lateststufflinksmall,
	.remainingtops,
	.textCenter,
	.topShow,
	.adtop,
	DIV[style="background-color:#CC3300;"],
	A[href^="http://media.fastclick.net/"],
	P[style="background-color:#fff; width:208px;"],
	P[style="background-color:#fff; width:220px;"],
	DIV[style="background-color:#EBF8FE; padding:8px;"],
	DIV[style="float:left;margin:7px;font-size:11px;"],
	IFRAME[src="http://www.animecrazy.net/newforumposts.html"],
	P[style="padding:10px;"],
	P[style="padding:4px 8px;"],
	DIV[style="background-color:#EBF8FE; padding:4px;font-size:18px;line-height:100%;"],
	DIV[style="background-color: rgb(204, 51, 0);"],
	[style="float:left;margin:6px;font-size:11px;"],
	[style="display:inline;border:3px solid rgb(204, 51, 0);"],
	DIV[style="font:14px Arial;margin-bottom:10px;"],
	iframe[width="700"],
	.MTL,
	.MTR{
		display: none !important;
		visibility: hidden;
	}
}
